newsitem.title: UK: Aluminium, copper pull LME higher by PM close.
newsitem.headline: Aluminium, copper pull LME higher by PM close.

text.p: ALUMINIUM - Finishes PM kerb session near day's high at $1,376.50, helped by stock fall of 2,875 tonnes.
COPPER - Poses modest gains after stocks decline sharply. But traders nervous that Singapore stocks will start to accumulate again soon. NICKEL - Ends near highs in choppy trade.
LEAD - Bounces in correction. OTHERS - Finish slightly higher.
